mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FTCORE."tcm_ntn_idct_dt" ( "edcf_ntn_cd", "idct_cd_vl", "crtr_yr", "idct_nm", "idct_unit", "idct_vl", "reg_dt", "reg_user_id", "mdfcn_dt", "mdfcn_user_id", "del_yn" ) VALUES ( #{edcfNtnCd}, #{idctCdVl}, #{crtrYr}, #{idctNm}, #{idctUnit}, #{idctVl}, SYS_DATETIME, 'system', SYS_DATETIME, 'system', 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT ntn_cd FROM tcm_ntn_cd WHERE del_yn='N' AND use_yn='Y' AND indiv_ntn_yn='Y'
